Diploma,B.Tech or M.Tech?

Available Courses are:
1. Diploma (Total Seats:140)
2. B.Tech(Total Seats:120)
3. M.Tech(Total Seats:80)

For DIPLOMA - 10th or 12th Pass

For BTECH - Diploma Cleared 10+2 with Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics + Entrance Exam acceptable by the University

For MTECH - Must have a Bachelor's degree in any engineering stream with at least 55% or equivalent CGPA.
**For NRI Student - English must be one of the subjects in last Qualifing Examination.

(You can fill the application form through our official Website or from our
 admission department.)
Step -2 After filling the form submit the required documents at our admission
 department and pay the required Fees and Deposit.
Step -3 Take a visit at our Campus.

**Last Date to Fill the Application Form is - 20 December '22.
For more information Go to our Website: www.charusat.ac.in

3. 2 Passport Size Photos.
